dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I suggest we keep a close eye on each other and share any suspicious behaviors or observations we may have during the day. Let's work together to ensure everyone's safety.

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the assassin. Let's work together, Charlie, to ensure his elimination and secure the safety of the village.
